guicomponents
Class GRoundControl

java.lang.Object
  guicomponents.GComponent
      guicomponents.GRoundControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GConstants, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GKnob
public abstract class GRoundControl
extends GComponent

This is an abstract class that provides the core functionality including mouse event handling for 'round controls' such as knobs.
Round components include both circular and oval components.

Author:
Peter Lager

A value of 1 is 1 degree per pixel and a value of 2 is 2 degrees per pixel.

isMouseORA

public boolean isMouseORA()
Get the 'over rotation arc' option

setMouseORA

public void setMouseORA(boolean overRotArcOnly)
If this is set to false (the default value) then the mouse button can be pressed over any part of the knob and bzeel to start rotating the knob. If it is true then only that portion of the knob within the rotation arc. param overRotArcOnly true or false

getValuef

public float getValuef()
Get the current value represented by the control as a floating point value.

Returns:
current float value

public int getValue()

setLimits

public void setLimits(float init,
                      float start,
                      float end)
Set the range of values that are to be returned by this control.

Parameters:
init - initial value of control
start - value matching the start rotation
end - value matching the start rotation (Values < start are acceptable)

setValue

public void setValue(float newValue)
Set the current value of the control

Parameters:
newValue - the value to use will be constrained to legal vales.

setValue

public void setValue(float newValue,
                     boolean ignoreInteria)
The same as setValue(newValue) except the second parameter determines whether we should ignore any inertia value so the affect is immediate.
Note if false then events will continue to be generated so if this causes unexpected behaviour then use setValue(newValue, true)

Parameters:
newValue - the value we wish the slider to become
ignoreInteria - if true change is immediate
